titles.title: A resolution waiving all points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 515) to provide for more detailed and uniform disclosure by credit and charge card issuers with respect to information relating to interest rates and other fees which may be incurred by consumers through the use of any credit or charge card, and against the consideration of such conference report.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-1080.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/12/1988--Introduced. Waives points of order against the conference report on H.R. 515 (credit and charge card information disclosure) and against its consideration.
